name: Bit Jumper: Blocky Birdy Fall - by Cobalt Play Games
name_original: Bit Jumper: Blocky Birdy Fall - by Cobalt Play Games
description:
DOWNLOAD IT TODAY FOR FREE - Bit Jumper Blocky Birdy Fall

Try to escape the devious forest and dont hit the red saw objects for as long as possible by jumping. Tap the screen to jump. This is awesome retro hardcore game play at its finest. Perfect for those who love quick impossible challenges.

FEATURES
- Single tap input, people of any age can play.
- Quick challenge, less than 1 minute per game.
- Great relaxing music and art.
- Save your top score.

WHAT PLAYERS ARE SAYING
- "One of the hardest and most devious games I've played. Simple and addictive, my type of game :)" - dungeon chump - March 2 2014

- "i last about 10 seconds usually but if feels great when I get a little longer. getting better step by step, awesome game" - amy darklings - March 2 2014


Show your support by rating Bit Jumper Blocky Birdy Fall
